title: New Cards aren't Random Enough! Look!
body:
I've mentioned almost doing this in Set 1 with Kayle.

Welp:

[img]https://i.imgur.com/J2jB48d.png[/img]

P.S. This game I literally got Coin drops and was well beyond 50 Coins by Gromps, yet look at the items I managed to grab. Poor souls actually let me last pick a Nami Pre-Mage Capped.

(Gotta say though..... the Shiv based Kog was kind of scary before the last 2-3 matches. Shiv can proc predator to 4 champs at once. Fun)

May the 3 Star Tier 5's be with you! (Especially one that hits twice!)

replies.body: I've still to this day never played with or against a gold tier 5 unit.

> [{quoted}](name=Porglit,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=BqlVOGs2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-26T19:23:42.429+0000)
>
> I've still to this day never played with or against a gold tier 5 unit.

I was 1 unit away from a lvl 3 lux once but it came down to the fact that the game lasted EXCEEDINGLY long... I was at like 1-3 health and the other guy was at 100 but I never lost once to him... So I got essentially like 5-7 extra rounds in there...

There is a reason they set the abilities of the 3 star 5 costs to basically be auto win.  In this example of Nami, 1 star is 25 damage, 2 is 50 and then 3 star jumps up to 300 damage.

Singed damage goes 200, 400, 2000
dang that looks like a fun comp
